## ğŸ·ï¸ æ¨¡æ¿æ ‡ç­¾ç³»ç»Ÿ

### è®¾è®¡é£æ ¼æ ‡ç­¾
- `modern` - ç°ä»£é£æ ¼
- `classic` - ç»å…¸é£æ ¼
- `minimal` - æç®€é£æ ¼

## ğŸš€ å¿«é€Ÿä½¿ç”¨

### æµè§ˆæ¨¡æ¿

```vue
<script setup lang="ts">

function handleTemplateSelect(template) {
  console.log('é€‰ä¸­æ¨¡æ¿:', template.displayName)
}
</script>

<template>
  <div class="template-browser">
    <TemplateSelector
      :categories="['login', 'dashboard']"
      :devices="['desktop', 'mobile']"
      @select="handleTemplateSelect"
    />
  </div>
</template>
```

### æ¸²æŸ“æ¨¡æ¿

```vue
  showLogo: true,
  enableSocialLogin: true

  <TemplateRenderer
    category="login"
    device="desktop"
    template="modern"
    :props="templateProps"
  />
</template>
```

```
â”œâ”€â”€ index.vue          # ä¸»ç»„ä»¶æ–‡ä»¶ (å¿…éœ€)
â”œâ”€â”€ config.ts          # é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ (å¿…éœ€)
â”œâ”€â”€ style.css          # æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶ (å¯é€‰)
â”œâ”€â”€ preview.png        # é¢„è§ˆå›¾ç‰‡ (æ¨è)
â””â”€â”€ README.md          # è¯´æ˜æ–‡æ¡£ (æ¨è)
```

### é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è§„èŒƒ

```typescript

export default {
  name: 'template-name',
  displayName: 'æ¨¡æ¿æ˜¾ç¤ºåç§°',
  description: 'æ¨¡æ¿æè¿°',
  version: '1.0.0',
  author: 'ä½œè€…åç§°',
  category: 'login',
  device: 'desktop',
  tags: ['modern', 'responsive'],

  props: {
    title: {
      type: String,
      default: 'é»˜è®¤æ ‡é¢˜',
      description: 'é¡µé¢æ ‡é¢˜'
    }
  },

  events: [
    {
      name: 'submit',
      description: 'è¡¨å•æäº¤äº‹ä»¶',
      payload: 'FormData'
    }
  ]
} as TemplateConfig
```


## ğŸ” æœç´¢å’Œè¿‡æ»¤

### æŒ‰åˆ†ç±»æœç´¢

```typescript
// æœç´¢ç™»å½•æ¨¡æ¿
```
